casebody.data:
E. A. GERETY, William Harrah, Charles Brown and Harold Pool, Appellants, v. ABBOT KINNEY COMPANY, Appellee. No. 11397. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. April 10, 1947. Leslie L. Heap, D. M. Kitzmiller, and Cobb & Utley, all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellants. Grainger & Hunt and Nicholas & Davis, all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before GÁRRECHT, MATHEWS, and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The-decree and order appealed from, 66 F. Supp. 841, is affirmed.
